00014 #ifndef SQL_TRANSACTION_H
00015 #define SQL_TRANSACTION_H
00016 
00017 #include "SQLConnection.h"
00018 #include "SQLException.h"
00019 
00020 namespace SQL {
00021 
00035 class Transaction {
00036 public:
00038    explicit Transaction( SQLConnection& connection ) throw (SQL::Exception):
00039       m_connection( connection ),
00040       m_commited( false ) {
00041       if ( ! m_connection.beginTransaction() ) {
00042          throw SQL::Exception( "Transaction: Begin transaction failed!" );
00043       }
00044    }
00045 
00048    ~Transaction() throw() {
00049       if ( ! m_commited ) {
00050          if ( ! m_connection.rollbackTransaction() ) {
00051             // So, what can we actually do about this?
00052             // I figure we can not do anything about it.
00053             mc2log << error << "SQL::Transaction: rollback failed!" << endl;
00054          }
00055       }
00056    }
00057 
00060    void commit() throw (SQL::Exception) {
00061       if ( ! m_commited ) {
00062          if ( ! m_connection.commitTransaction() ) {
00063             throw SQL::Exception( "Transaction:: Commit transaction failed!" );
00064          }
00065          m_commited = true;
00066       }
00067    }
00068 
00069 private:
00070    SQLConnection& m_connection; 
00071    bool m_commited; 
00072 };
00073 
00074 } // SQL
00075 
00076 #endif // SQL_TRANSACTION_H
